cw4

Interface ContactManagerPlus

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContactManager, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContactManagerImpl

    public interface ContactManagerPlus
extends ContactManager, java.io.Serializable
    Class to Manage contacts and Meetings including methods that are missing from ContactManager needed for both JUnit testing and a functional program.
    Since:
    28 February 2015
    Author:
    Oliver Smart <osmart01@dcs.bbk.ac.uk>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Contact> getAllContacts()
      A simple getter for all contacts.
      java.util.List<FutureMeeting> getAllFutureMeetings()
      A simple getter for all future meetings.
      java.util.List<PastMeeting> getAllPastMeetings()
      A simple getter for all past meetings
      FileSaveRetrieve getFileSR()
      Getter for fileSR used for saving the ContactManager to file
      java.util.Calendar getPretendNow()
      Getter for pretendNow - the overriding date for "now".
      void overrideDateNow(java.util.Calendar pretendNow)
      Used to set a false current date in place of the real actual date/time "now".

      • Methods inherited from interface cw4.ContactManager

        addFutureMeeting, addMeetingNotes, addNewContact, addNewPastMeeting, flush, getContacts, getContacts, getFutureMeeting, getFutureMeetingList, getFutureMeetingList, getMeeting, getPastMeeting, getPastMeetingList

    • Method Detail

      • overrideDateNow

        void overrideDateNow(java.util.Calendar pretendNow)
        Used to set a false current date in place of the real actual date/time "now". Useful for testing and may be for the program.
        Parameters:
        pretendNow - the date/time to treat as "now".

      • getPretendNow

        java.util.Calendar getPretendNow()
        Getter for pretendNow - the overriding date for "now".
        Returns:
        the date/time to treat as "now" or null if no pretend is set (so real system time will be used).

      • getFileSR

        FileSaveRetrieve getFileSR()
        Getter for fileSR used for saving the ContactManager to file
        Returns:
        the FileSaveRetrieve object - useful to alter the file name to save to and/or the method used

      • getAllContacts

        java.util.List<Contact> getAllContacts()
        A simple getter for all contacts. Added it because it would be really useful in actually writing a program!
        Returns:
        list of all the contacts

      • getAllFutureMeetings

        java.util.List<FutureMeeting> getAllFutureMeetings()
        A simple getter for all future meetings.
        Returns:
        a list of meetings that is chronologically sorted.

      • getAllPastMeetings

        java.util.List<PastMeeting> getAllPastMeetings()
        A simple getter for all past meetings
        Returns:
        a list of meetings that is chronologically sorted.
